headline: Roper Technologies Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: Roper Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ:ROP) is one of the best stocks for a dividend stock portfolio. On June 11, the company declared a quarterly dividend of $0.825 per share, which was in line with its previous dividend. Although the latest dividend remained unchanged from the previous one, the company has maintained a 33-year track record of […]
